description:
Have you sat in meetings thinking they were a complete waste of time? What about meetings where you talk about the same issues that still haven't been addressed from the last meeting…or...meetings where 1-2 people dominate the majority of the discussion?

How would you like to be known for running meetings that are short and action-oriented with clear outcomes? What about being the person known for only scheduling meetings when they are absolutely necessary? If you answered YES, then this course is made for you!

In less than one hour, you'll learn how to run meetings that no one will ever want to miss! Whether you’re a new supervisor or a seasoned administrator, you’ll learn various techniques that will enhance your meeting management skills. As part of the bonus lesson, you'll learn the toughest part of running meetings…dealing with problem participants! Even if you’re not leading meetings, this course will provide you key concepts to be a more engaged meeting participant.

Along with the course, you’ll receive:

  1. Study guide with each lesson that includes the transcript and key concepts of the lesson.
  2. Agenda template to help you develop action-oriented meetings
  3. Problem Participant Toolkit with techniques for dealing with disruptive meeting attendees.

***PLEASE CLICK NOW TO ENROLL IN THIS COURSE***
title: How to Run the Best Meetings Ever!
